sentence.text: Through a whole genome sequencing (WGS) analysis of the nine subjects (four lung cancer patients and five normal family members of FLC), we obtained a whole genome datanegative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated of DNA alterations in FLC samples.

Subsequently, the top 12 highly mutated genes were selected for validation by polymerase chain reaction and DNA sequencing in an expanded sample negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated including FLC, sporadic lung cancer, and healthy population.
Mutations of the five genes (regulation of GTPase activity, ANKRD20A2, regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, ZNF812, vasculogenesis) may be potential germline mutations of lung cancer.

entity.text: regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: We also analyzed specific mutations within the 12 genes and found that some specific mutations within the stimulatory C-type lectin receptor signaling pathway, biological_process and biological_process genes showed higher frequencies in the samples of FLC and/or lung cancer tissue, compared with the healthy population.

entity.text: stimulatory C-type lectin receptor signaling pathway
